function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in the provision of quality public and active transport alternatives due to veneration of private car","Impact":"Reduced access to sustainable and safe transport options, leading to increased reliance on private cars and higher carbon emissions","Mitigation":"Investment in public and active transport infrastructure, policies to discourage private car use, and public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Public transport tracking apps, real-time transport congestion monitoring systems, e-scooter safety technology","People":"General public, especially those without access to private vehicles","Owner":"Government, urban planning authorities, public transport operators"},{"Description":"Struggles in promoting public transport due to social distancing measures","Impact":"Limited usage of public transport, exacerbating traffic congestion and environmental issues","Mitigation":"Developing real-time mobile phone apps for public transport congestion monitoring, government funding for active travel infrastructure, and educational initiatives for safe public transport usage","Technologies":"Real-time mobile phone apps, e-scooter safety features, road space reconfiguration technology","People":"Public transport users, urban residents, commuters","Owner":"Government, transportation authorities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Risk of overcrowding in public transport","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission, discomfort for passengers, and reduced efficiency of public transport systems","Mitigation":"Real-time alerts for overcrowding, alternative route suggestions, and infrastructure improvements for crowd management","Technologies":"Real-time mobile apps, transport tracking systems, crowd management technology","People":"Public transport passengers, commuters, urban residents","Owner":"Public transport operators, technology companies, government"}]}
